resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign Up

Navigational Guide

The app is designed to be intuitive and user-friendly. Here's a quick guide to help you find your way around:

Home Screen: Your central hub for accessing all features. From here, you can dive into language lessons, access AR mode, or review your progress.

Lessons: This section contains a series of interactive lessons tailored to your chosen language. Each lesson builds on the previous one, reinforcing your learning.

Quizzes: Test your knowledge and reinforce learning through quizzes found at the end of each lesson module.

AR Mode: Engage with the real world by activating the AR feature. Simply point your camera at objects to see their names in your target language.

Profile: Manage your account settings and track your learning milestones.

Troubleshooting Tips

Encountering issues? Here are some quick fixes:

Login Issues: Ensure your login credentials are entered correctly. If you've forgotten your password, use the 'Forgot Password' feature to reset it.

App Crashes: If the app unexpectedly quits, start by closing and reopening the app. Make sure you have the latest version installed.

AR Camera Issues: For AR difficulties, check that your camera is functioning correctly and that you have granted the app permission to use it.

Should problems persist after these steps, please consult our detailed troubleshooting guide or contact our support team for assistance.

Feature Usage

Maximize your learning with these features:

Using AR for Learning: In AR mode, align the camera with any object to see its name in the language you're learning. It's a fun and interactive way to expand your vocabulary!

Completing Exercises: Each lesson includes exercises designed to reinforce your understanding. Use hints if you're stuck, and repeat exercises as needed to ensure mastery.

Study Aids: Access various study aids such as flashcards and summary notes to bolster your learning outside of structured lessons.

Remember, practice makes perfect, so utilize these features regularly to enhance your language skills. For more detailed guidance on each feature, visit the relevant sections within this Help Center.
